Django Settings AttributesÂ¶

KEY_PATH: indicates the location of the keys folder. This is relative to the project folder.:

KEY_PATH='keys'

IS_SECURE_DEVICE: If ‘’True’’ suppresses a warning that the ‘’restricted-rsa’’ private key should not be available on insecure devices.:

IS_SECURE_DEVICE=False
